#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */

  auto evNew = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  bool result = true;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &oid, &k, &v, &result] () {
    Log_info("In Put at %d with id %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, oid);
    const auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    uint64_t index, term;
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    result = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  });
  if(!result) {
     eventCompletionMap[oid] = true;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("Waiting for 1 sec");
  eventMap[oid] = evNew;
  evNew->Wait(1000000);
   Log_info("Done Waiting");
  if(result && evNew->get() == 1) {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto evNew = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  bool result = true;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &oid, &k, &v, &result] () {
    Log_info("In Append at %d with id %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, oid);
    const auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    uint64_t index, term;
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    result = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  });
  if(!result) {
    eventCompletionMap[oid] = true;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  eventMap[oid] = evNew;
  Log_info("Start Waiting");
  evNew->Wait(1000000);
  Log_info("Done Waiting");
  if(result && evNew->get() == 1) {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("In Get");
  auto evNew = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  bool result = true;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([this, &oid, &k, &result] () {
     Log_info("In Get at %d with id %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, oid);


    const auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    uint64_t index, term;
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    result = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  });
  if(!result) {
    eventCompletionMap[oid] = true;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  eventMap[oid] = evNew;
  evNew->Wait(1000000);
  if(result && evNew->get() == 1) {
    *v = map[k];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx);
  Log_info("In OnNextCommand at %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  std::map<uint64_t, std::shared_ptr<rrr::IntEvent>>::iterator it = eventMap.find(std::stoull(v->data_[0]));
  if (it != eventMap.end()) {
    // Key found in the map
    eventMap[std::stoull(v->data_[0])]->Set(1);
  }
  string op = v->data_[1];
  if(op == "put") {
    map[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
  } else if(op == "append") {
    string currentVal = map[v->data_[2]];


    map[v->data_[2]] = currentVal+v->data_[3];
  }
  // Log_info("In OnNextCommand: %d at %d", eventCompletionMap[std::stoull(v->data_[0])], GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  // if(eventCompletionMap[std::stoull(v->data_[0])] == true || !GetRaftServer().isLeader) {
  //   return;
  // }
  // Log_info("Not returned");
  
  // eventCompletionMap[std::stoull(v->data_[0])] = true;
  // Log_info("Finish OnNextCommand");
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
